BG3 Blade of the First Blood Location & Where to Find

Location: Meet Orin in the Temple of Bhaal, kill her before killing the Cultists, and loot her before the battle is over. Upon finishing the battle this item changes to Bloodthirst due to story reasons so this item is effectively unusable on a permanent basis. Quest: Crafting: Merchant: Dropped by: Orin.
